column5: Mike asked about a delivery in the mail, if I had recieved.  I had no reason to wonder why.Today I found out why.  Dude ,this didnt warrent a delivery from you on this. It did how ever, warrent me going out to buy a new rod to go with it.The wife thanks you.  SWEET REEL. THANK YOU. You shouldnt have.     <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf" flashvars="file=http%3A%2F%2Fvidmg.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fv731%2Fmisfish%2F20110307_01.mp4">  Thanks bud.  See ya on the river.    Grubs??????????
Got to love surprises B Good on you Mike
Good on yaa Mike. Looks like you almost got a tear out of Brian.   Art
I love this place....
Solo, I have Pm-ed you my address  Nice!!

Well that was slightly embarrassing.     Like I said I felt kinda responsible when that reel I talked you into buying turned out to be rough.  No big deal, all that stuff was free.  The grubs are for...nevermind. You should know what a grub is for!
cool!   thats mighty nice! Hey I recived an ice hut here on OFC from sandbag. this is a wonderfull place isint it!!
very cool
Not at all bud. Oh you mean for you.   Yes ,but not warrented.
But Brian, I mean that he went out of his way to make sure you go somthing that will work when he didn't need to.  so again I say, very cool.
My gwad man,are you drinking from that 3 lter? LOL.  I hear ya Geoff.
HAHAHAHA, nope but I might consider it.  oh wait, it's all water...
If you send one to me make sure the handle is on the other side eh.
Well done Mike, as Lucy says, "you're a good man Charlie Brown"
Hey Solo, My truck is broken....
Good on you Mike !!! I salute you buddy  Paul
Unless I sold it to you, you're on your own.
There certainly are some great people on this board, nicely done Mike.
Awesome stuff, Mike!!  Great to see gestures like this, and, the way OFC board members will look out for each other. Have fun with the new reel, Brian!
Ahhh Well, cant blame a guy for tryin'  Very well done, good to hear things like this.
I heard a rumour that there is a package of pike spoons on the way to Orangeville!!!
Nice Job this is a unique place with a tonne of good guys/gals
Class act Mike
Solo, that's some good karma for you. That's what I like about this board, everyone is helpful and there aren't any scammers out there trying to score off of other members.
Or as Brian is known to say...  "Your a good man...tells your mother"
